resources.string:
This application allows two Android devices to carry out text chat session over Bluetooth.
 This Application does not require an internet connection for its working:
 This is version 1.0 of this Application.
 Many more features are yet to be added, stay tuned for those.
This app requires 2 devices, one device will start connection and other device will accept that connection.
The bluetooth discovery mode of other device needs to be turned on while your device search for it.
Once search is completed it will give list of all devices whose Bluetooth discovery is turned on and is ready to get connected.
Now click on the name of other device from the list of devices.
Once both devices are connected, the chat session will be initiated and you will enter chat window.
If back button is pressed the chat session will be terminated.
You can also make your device discoverable to other devices by clicking on the Make discoverable button.
You can Rename your device for bluetooth connection by clicking on the Change Device Name in Main Menu.
